plot outline: Cheater Ramachari is a hero who tries to fight against social odds such a demonetization, prostitution and black money. He cheats the greedy and helps the needy people. But then he gets caught by the police, after which the story takes a different angle, which is a blend of sentiments, action and confusion.
title: Mr. Cheater Ramachari
